    • Method Detail

      • doBasicMaxDepthStage

        protected void doBasicMaxDepthStage(Node rootNode,
                                    String saveName,
                                    int desiredDepth,
                                    float fractionOfWorkers,
                                    int maxGames)
        Setup and perform a TreeStage_MaxDepth search. Tries to get at least one branch to the specified depth. Uses Sampler_UCB with EvaluationFunction_Distance.
        Parameters:
        rootNode - Tree root node.
        saveName - Name of the file to save stage data to. This is sparse.
        desiredDepth - Depth to get a branch to.
        fractionOfWorkers - 0 to 1, proportion of workers to allot to this stage.
        maxGames - Maximum number of games to play before giving up.

      • doBasicMinDepthStage

        protected void doBasicMinDepthStage(Node rootNode,
                                    String saveName,
                                    int minDepth,
                                    float fractionOfWorkers,
                                    int maxGames)
        Setup and perform a TreeStage_MinDepth search. Tries to get ALL branches to a minimum depth (if possible). Uses Sampler_FixedDepth
        Parameters:
        rootNode - Tree root node.
        saveName - Name of the file to save stage data to. This is sparse.
        minDepth - Depth to get all branches to, if failure doesn't happen first.
        fractionOfWorkers - 0 to 1, proportion of workers to allot to this stage.
        maxGames - Maximum number of games to play before giving up.

      • doFixedGamesToFailureStage

        protected void doFixedGamesToFailureStage(Node rootNode,
                                          String saveName,
                                          float fractionOfWorkers,
                                          int numGames)
        Does a search where all games are played until failure, and all games are saved densely. The search is greedy. The goal is to collect a lot of running data, including falls.
        Parameters:
        rootNode - Root node that the tree is built from.
        saveName - Save file name prefix. Timestamp will be appended in the final name.
        fractionOfWorkers - Portion of max workers used by this stage.
        numGames - Number of games to play.

      • appendSummaryLog

        public void appendSummaryLog(String addedLine)
        Add something to the log which will be finalized when the program is closed.

      • getSaveLocation

        protected File getSaveLocation()
        Return the save location file.

      • assignAllowableActions

        public static void assignAllowableActions(int recoveryExceptionStart)
        Assign the correct generator of actions based on the baseline options and exceptions. Will assign a broader set of options for "recovery" at the specified starting depth. Pass -1 to disable this.

      • assignAllowableActionsWider

        public static void assignAllowableActionsWider(int recoveryExceptionStart)
